1.2.name: wordpress/showtweets-plugin
1.2.description:
With the showtweets plugin you can now easily add your own twitter feed to your blog, display your latest tweets to your visitors and offer them the ability to follow you on twitter.

This widget is easy to setup and you can have your feed setup in minutes, there are several options to choose from to suit your likings.

Features

  • Easy to install, setup and use.
  • Text area in admin panel to customize with your own css
  • Show you avatar and the number of tweets
  • Choose from multiple css styles including your themes css style
  • Turn you cashe on and off
  • Can be used under 4 differet languages(English, Frech, Spanish, Germen)
  • Support available and instructions provided
